label: 家室
本: Gender in Early Classical Japan: Marriage, Leadership, and Political Status in Village and Palace. Monumenta Nipponica, 60-4  . 2005
説明文: * Often interpreted as female helpmate to iegimi". * Paired with "iegimi" in texts like the "Nihon Ryōiki" - thought to indicate female part of pair. These pairs might have formed an "ie" (family) but typically operated separate "yake" (locations of economic enterprise)"
